TopicTitle: [1.6.0] Gilly Plus: Gilly looks good in blue

Articles.Content:
Gilly Plus is a mod that remakes Gilly to be blue, fixes the timewarp crap and adds craters! just in case you ever suffer from Gilly-is-boring-and-not-blue-enough-itis!

https://imgur.com/gallery/PEFIMGV Pics for Clicks

Download: https://spacedock.info/mod/2046/Gilly Plus

Kopernicus is the only dependency

Also, this does remake Gilly's surface, so any spacecraft on Gilly should be launched into a stable orbit before downloading this mod.

Edited January 2, 2019 by Mythical Donuts
Fixed the download

First if all : hi it's me from KO

Second of all : I love this

[IMGUR]PEFIMGV[/IMGUR]

heck

that's supposed to work

[IMGUR]PEFIMGV[IMGUR]﻿

Hey, this is a new account I've just made because my old one was an absolute mess :p . But that's besides the point. I have some experience with Kopernicus and was wondering whether you would give me permission to continue this fun little mod, have it updated to the new version and do some minor bug fixes, etc, considering you have pretty much abandoned this project. I just wanted to get a thumbs up from you before starting anything! Also sorry for the incredibly late post as I've only just recently got back into planet modding.
W H A T H A V E Y O U D O N E T O G I L LY ! ! !
